captions.text:
-How many years have
you been in braces?

-Six years, and you
finally get them off.
I hope they turn out good.
Look what they put up for me.

Congratulations to Bailey
for getting her braces off.

-So how long has
it been, Bailey?
All right, let's sit you back.

All right, Mom and
Dad, we good to go?

-If she's happy
with them, I'm good.

All right, let's start
taking them off, OK?

-So as these come off, you'll
feel just a little pop, OK?

-It's just your teeth
coming out, Bailey.

-I cannot believe
how good she is.

She's like, what are
you doing to my sister?

Who's that guy with
the crazy glasses?

Your tops, [? sweet pea. ?]
[? Sweet pea, ?] yup,

They come off a little quicker
than they go on, don't they?

Now that they've finally
gotten all of my brackets off,

they're just going to drill
off all of that nasty glue me

And I was actually really
scared for this part,

because I've heard pretty
bad things about the drill,

and then I've heard
pretty good things.

And so I was going
to bring ear buds,

so I wouldn't have to listen
to them drill on my teeth,

and the drill wasn't even
half as bad as you imagine.

It only takes a little while
to straighten out your teeth,

and I was really
happy in the long run,

because it cleaned all my teeth
and made them look beautiful.

After all that
drilling, I am finally
ready to put on my retainers.

OK, I'm going to
be honest with you,

no one likes the
mold part, but you

have to survive it to
have your straight teeth.

But just make sure
you don't barf.

-Do you want your
braces back on?

-We can put a headgear
like we wore in the '80s.

-Thank you guys so,
so much for watching.

Don't to forget to leave a
comment below if you or a loved

on has ever had
braces, and also don't

forget to follow us on
Twitter, @BrookandBailey,

and we will see
you guys next week.

-And you just, like, pop them
up, and then put them on,

comments.author: Hannah Allen

comments.text:
I'm getting spacers in 4 days, and braces in 12, any tips? I'm really 
nervous...﻿
comments.author: Hadley R.

comments.text: +Jessica Philips +Emma Slemma Thanks!! That helps a lot!💘
comments.author: Hadley R.

comments.text:
+Hadley R. Make sure you clean your teeth as often as possible! I can't 
stress that enough. When you get braces its going to hurt a while, so take 
Advil RIGHT after you get them. You'll thank me, don't expect them to come 
off the exact date they say. They will probably come off 3 months after the 
due date. Lastly, when you drink soda, make sure you brush your teeth right 
after just so your teeth don't stain.
Congratulations you'll soon be in the brace face club!
comments.author: Emma Slemma

comments.text:
Just clean them really good and do not use whitening toothpaste! Just 
follow all the instructions they give you and they get pretty easy to take 
care of after a while. I just barely got mine off today and they said if I 
had used whitening toothpaste my teeth would be a different color

comments.text:
When I got my braces on, it didn't hurt at all while I was getting them on, 
but the next morning they will be a little sore. Don't be scared, it's not 
painful at all. Also, make sure to wear lots of chapstick the days before 
since they stretch your lips a bit and if your lips are chapped that will 
hurt :)
